camp (supporters of a doctrine, party, etc.), faction (of a party)
to run (a business), to operate, to conduct, to practice (law, medicine, etc.)
to carry out, to perform, to lead (a life)
to hold (a Buddhist or Shinto ceremony)

running one's own business, doing business on one's own, self-employment

building (a temple, palace, etc.), construction, erection
directly managed store (as opposed to a distributor)
